definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
a type of clay found in the region of Yixing 宜興|宜兴[Yi2 xing1], used to make Yixing stoneware, with its distinctive russet or dark purple coloring
cinnabar/mercuric sulfide HgS/also written 硃砂|朱砂[zhu1 sha1]
cinnabar/mercuric sulfide HgS/also written 硃砂|朱砂[zhu1 sha1]

sentences.english: The produced sand is good in shape, its quality being easily controlled, and with low unit price.
sentences.chinese: 其产品粒形好，质量容易控制，成品砂单价低。

sentences.english: Resin coated sand (RCS) for shell coremaking and shell molding by hot box process is evaluated and found that is uneconomical.
sentences.chinese: 将树脂覆膜砂大量用于热芯盒制芯是不经济的。

sentences.english: In West China, there is a great abundance of eolian sand in vest expanses of desert.
sentences.chinese: 我国西部地区沙漠分布广泛，富产风积砂。

sentences.english: This paper also presents some new opinions on the use of sand cushion.
sentences.chinese: 本文还对砂垫层的作用提出了新的看法。

sentences.english: In sandpaper, bone glue is actually the glue between the sand and the paper.
sentences.chinese: 砂纸中把砂和纸粘在一起的胶水实际上就是骨胶。

sentences.english: So a little more sanding and it's truing up nicely again.
sentences.chinese: 因此，多一点的砂和它的修整了很好的一次。

sentences.english: Gold mineralization took place in the silt-mud-mixed middle member of the Baifeng Formation.
sentences.chinese: 金矿化出现在砂泥混积的百逢组中段。

sentences.english: The effect of thermoplastic phenolic resin and sand on performance of resin coated sand was researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究了热塑性酚醛树脂和原砂对覆膜砂性能的影响。

sentences.english: Sprinkle cat litter or sand on icy patches.
sentences.chinese: 把猫砂或者是沙子撒在过道上。

sentences.english: Pottery utensils for daily use were chiefly made from refined terracotta and red sandy clay.
sentences.chinese: 日用陶器以细泥红陶和夹砂红褐陶为主。

sentences.english: Dry reclamation of sodium silicate-bonded sands is reviewed in the paper. The keys of reclamation of sodium silicate-bonded sands are collapsibility and dewaxing rate.
sentences.chinese: 水玻璃砂的干法再生主要是解决溃散性和脱膜率问题。

sentences.english: Dry reclamation of sodium silicate-bonded sands is reviewed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 水玻璃砂的干法再生主要是解决溃散性和脱膜率问题。

sentences.english: Moreover, influence of numbers of vents on shooting process is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 此外还研究了排气塞的数目对射砂过程的影响。

sentences.english: The desert sands in central Taklimakan Desert have peculiar engineering properties.
sentences.chinese: 塔克拉玛干腹地沙漠砂具有特殊的岩土工程性质。

definition: variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
stars of the Big Dipper that constitute the tail of the dipper
